did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Cornell University commencement programs and class printed materials, 1869-2016.
did.physdesc: Announcements, invitations, tickets, programs, dance cards, handbooks, directories, class statistics, schedules, broadsides, periodicals, and other materials.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Included are announcements, invitations, tickets, programs, dance cards, handbooks, directories, class statistics, schedules, broadsides, periodicals, and other printed items relating to class activities such as balls, Class Day celebrations, athletic events, lectures, and other campus events. Commencement and baccalaureate materials include invitations, admission tickets, dance cards, programs, lists of degree candidates, and other items pertaining to ceremonies held by various colleges of the university.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Included are announcements, invitations, tickets, programs, dance cards, handbooks, directories, class statistics, schedules, broadsides, periodicals, and other printed items relating to class activities such as balls, Class Day celebrations, athletic events, lectures, and other campus events. Commencement and baccalaureate materials include invitations, admission tickets, dance cards, programs, lists of degree candidates, and other items pertaining to ceremonies held by various colleges of the university.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Cornell University commencement programs and class printed materials, #37-8-346. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
